document.full_text: monday morning skate: florida reaches new lows in the history of n.h.l. playoff chases; zach parise plans unexplainable return to the devils; corey perry gets push for hart trophy consideration.
document.title: monday morning skate: parise's late comeback, perry's fantastic finish and panthers' historic drought
